message: But just then, I hear the sound of footsteps running toward us.
Cops?

name: ノイズ
message: "This way."
Noiz grabs me by the arm and starts running. We turn a corner.

name: 悪島
message: "Oooooh noooo! This is the END OF THE LINE for you, my little terrorists!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Tch."

name: 悪島
message: "You're not getting away this time! Come out with your hands UP! HAHAHAHAHA!"
Akushima...!
By the time it even occurs to me to be afraid, Noiz is already charging straight at him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell?!"

name: 悪島
message: "Hnghh?!"
Unable to react to Noiz's punch, Akushima lands flat on his back with an impressive thud.
He appears to be unconscious. Bright red blood is streaming from his nose.
I can't believe Noiz just up and punched him like that. And he managed to do that with a single punch?
When I look at Noiz, I notice he's wearing some gnarly looking metal gloves.
Guess he's not just some internet tough guy...

name: ノイズ
message: "Come on, let's move."
Noiz grabs my hand and takes off again.
I snap out of it and start running.
Somehow managing to evade the police, we head to the meetup with Mr. Haga.
